SELECT DISTINCT T.* FROM ( SELECT MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, IF(MENU_ICON IS NULL, 'zmdi zmdi-apps', MENU_ICON) MENU_ICON, IF(MENU_URL IS NULL, '', MENU_URL) MENU_URL, MENU_LEVEL, MENU_INDEX FROM SYS_MENU WHERE MENU_VALID=1 AND MENU_PID=#{menuId} ) T WHERE T.MENU_ID IN (
SELECT MENU_ID FROM ROLE_MENU_REL WHERE ROLE_ID = #{roleId} UNION SELECT MENU_PID FROM SYS_MENU WHERE MENU_ID IN (SELECT MENU_ID FROM ROLE_MENU_REL WHERE ROLE_ID like #{roleId}) UNION SELECT MENU_PID FROM SYS_MENU WHERE MENU_ID IN (SELECT MENU_PID FROM SYS_MENU WHERE MENU_ID IN (SELECT MENU_ID FROM ROLE_MENU_REL WHERE ROLE_ID = #{roleId}))
SELECT MENU_ID FROM ROLE_MENU_REL WHERE ROLE_ID IN (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM USER_ROLE_REL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) UNION SELECT MENU_PID FROM SYS_MENU WHERE MENU_ID IN (SELECT MENU_ID FROM ROLE_MENU_REL WHERE ROLE_ID IN (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM USER_ROLE_REL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) UNION SELECT MENU_PID FROM SYS_MENU WHERE MENU_ID IN (SELECT MENU_PID FROM SYS_MENU WHERE MENU_ID IN (SELECT MENU_ID FROM ROLE_MENU_REL WHERE ROLE_ID IN (SELECT ROLE_ID FROM USER_ROLE_REL WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})))
) ORDER BY T.MENU_LEVEL, T.MENU_INDEX
